document.full_text: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala is set to win the first round of peru's presidential election on sunday as poor voters rally behind him, but he may struggle in a run-off against one of three rivals backed by big business.
document.title: leftist favored in peru vote but run-off expected
lines_and_colors: left-wing nationalist ollanta humala is set to win the first round of peru's presidential election on sunday as poor voters rally behind him, but he may struggle in a run-off against one of three rivals backed by big business.
